China media warns against taking China's Indian Ocean research as threatsChinese state media warned on Friday that a report by a prominent U.S. think tank on the military uses of Chinese scientific research across the Indian Ocean gave "ammunition" to countries bent on concocting threats from China. Fri, 12 Jan 2024 07:51:19 GMT AOQP3UMTK5JW5DGBLJNI3RVP3E https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/china-media-warns-against-china-take-indian-ocean-research-threats-2024-01-12/Greg Torode世界亚太地区
Russia's Putin says he will visit disputed Kuril islandsRussian President Vladimir Putin has said that he will definitely one day visit the Southern Kuril Islands which are at the centre of a dispute with Japan that has lasted since World War Two. Fri, 12 Jan 2024 07:40:56 GMT ZB22E27IINKGVC6QLYASJYX5H4 https://www.reuters.com/world/ Russia-putin-says-he-will-visit-disputed-kuril-islands-2024-01-12/Reuters世界
Britain to hike funds for Ukraine to buy drones, Sunak visits KyivBritish Prime Minister Rishi Sunak travelled to Kyiv on Friday to announce an increase in military funding to help Ukraine purchase new military drones, including surveillance, long-range strike and sea drones. Fri, 12 Jan 2024 07:06:25 GMT F4NIGCYNORPHTMFLOPSRIB5DUM https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/uk-pm-sunak-increase-support-ukraine-visit-kyiv-friday-2024-01-12/Reuters世界欧洲
Who are Yemen's Houthis and why are they under attack?The United States and Britain launched strikes from the air and sea against Houthi military targets in Yemen in response to the movement's attacks on ships in the Red Sea, a dramatic regional widening of the Israel-Hamas war in Gaza. Fri, 12 Jan 2024 07:00:54 GMT FGF3ZDVMPFJVLHR2H3VIGATION https://www.reuters.com/world/middle-east/yemen-houthis-who-are-under-attack-2024-01-12/Maha Dahan世界中东地区
Taiwan parties to make final push for support in critical electionTaiwan's three main political parties will hold mass rallies on Friday evening in a final push for support ahead of critical presidential and parliamentary elections happening against a backdrop of increased Chinese pressure on the island. Fri, 12 Jan 2024 06:54:27 GMT 4NMV3GRDHZIX5FIGLEWZ7I7KWM https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/taiwan-parties-make-final-push-support-ritic-election-2024-01-12/Zahra Matarani, Joseph Campbell世界亚太地区
Myanmar rebel alliance agree ceasefire with ruling military - rebel group TNLAAn alliance of ethnic minority armies in northern Myanmar has agreed a ceasefire with the ruling military, a leader of one of the groups, the TNLA, said on Friday, adding the talks involved an envoy from neighbouring China. Fri, 12 Jan 2024 06:08:10 GMT L3B4JBMQUVM6ZE5NT6ZXDRFCT4 https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/myanmar-rebel-alliance-agree-ceasefire-with-ruling-military-rebel-group-tnla-2024-01-12/Reuters世界亚太地区
WHO sees 'incredibly low' COVID, flu vaccination rates as cases surgeLow vaccination rates against the latest versions of COVID-19 and influenza are putting pressure on healthcare systems this winter, leading public health officials told Reuters. In the United States, several European countries, and other parts of the world, there have been reports of rising hospitalizations linked to respiratory infections in recent weeks. Death rates have also ticked up among older adults in some regions, but far below the COVID pandemic peak. Fri, 12 Jan 2024 06:02:48 GMT TBRLANBGZZP5XHRGIIS6QDBKQ4 https://www.reuters.com/business/healthcare-pharmaceuticals/who-sees-incredible-low-covid-flu-vaccination-rates-case-surge-2024-01-12/Jennifer Rigby, Julie Steenhuysen商业医疗保健与制药
Iran says US-Britain attack on Houthis will fuel instability in regionIran said on Friday it condemns the U.S.-Britain attack on Houthis in Yemen warning that it will fuel "insecurity and instability" in the region, Iranian state media reported. Fri, 12 Jan 2024 05:55:43 GMT R3WQY5MAUZIIHKK4IXGUDFTLDM https://www.reuters.com/world/middle-east/iran-says-us-britain-houthis-attack-will-fuel-region-instability-2024-01-12/Reuters世界中东地区
S.Korea court overturns conviction against contractor on Taiwan submarinesA South Korean appeals court has thrown out the conviction of a local company charged with violating trade laws for its work on Taiwan's new military submarine program, a ruling reviewed by Reuters showed. Fri, 12 Jan 2024 05:54:06 GMT NB6DD6MEQNO45EY44HDPJEARLY https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/korea-court-overturns-conviction-against-contractor-taiwan-submarines-2024-01-12/Ju-Min Park世界亚太地区
Russia scolds United States and Britain for strikes on Yemen, asks for UN meetingRussia on Friday scolded the United States and Britain for military strikes on Yemen which Moscow said escalated tensions across the Middle East and showed a complete disregard for international law. Fri, 12 Jan 2024 05:29:40 GMT UPQ3X6UTHVL4BIY4PWW6ABHJHE https://www.reuters.com/world/ Russia-requests-un-security-council-meeting-after-us-britain-strike-yemen-2024-01-12/Reuters世界
Taiwan expects China to apply pressure on incoming govt after electionTaiwan's government believes China is likely to attempt to put pressure on its incoming president after the island goes to the polls on Saturday, including staging military manoeuvres near the island this spring, two senior government officials said. Fri, 12 Jan 2024 05:17:46 GMT KIFK2TTNEZMSLLJRBHMNTXQKBU https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/taiwan-expects-china-to-apply-Pressure-incoming-government-after-election-2024-01-12/Yimou Lee, Ben Blanchard世界亚太地区
